name: The Pulsing Amulet of 'Zzzzer'
data: It increases the users strength pathetically.
It increases the users constitution pathetically.
It increases the users intelligence a good amount.
It has average armour class for its type (pathetic in general).
It increases the users spellpoint regeneration like a god.
It decreases the users hitpoint regeneration pathetically.
This item loses its magical powers with average speed.
It decreases the users magical resistance somewhat.
It increases the users cold resistance somewhat.
It gives tiny bonus to the skill 'quick chant'.
It affects the user's skill knowledge.
It makes the target more susceptable to magic damage.
It modifies the users cold resistance.
